item.description:
Having a bit of a gathering of friends at my house on Saturday night, and as I'm looking over my list of close friends, I'm noticing they're all either homebrewers, gardeners, foodies, cyclists, beekeepers, world travelers, landscapers, beer/wine geeks, musicians, cooks, machinists, chile-heads, teachers, craftsmen, back-yard chicken farmers, or some combination of those... and I'm thinking, what the hell, invite a few Homesteaders and see what happens!  

Join me for a beer and sample one of my meads, if its not raining I'll put a campfire on the back patio, nothing wild, just a gathering of interesting, educated, civilized folks who appreciate like-minded people.

Talk to me about my beehive in the backyard, my home renovation adventures, or stories from my 18 years of cooking professionally.   

Got something to share? Bring it if you please.

Don't like beer or mead? Bring your chosen beverage.

Got a friend? Bring them along.  

  

 

 

*if you drive, parking on Broadway is free and unlimited for non-somerville residents. If you don't have a resident sticker, I recommend parking on Broadway, to avoid a parking ticket.
item.name: Random Gathering of Good People on a Saturday Night
